name: A Cup's Life
description:
Each room is a new little puzzle for you to solve. While you play as a cup of tea you push and pour water on cookies in order to get through to the next room. 

If you're a jammer then please rate our game!  - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/a-cups-life

Controller:

WASD - Navigate Character

Return/Space - Menu Confirm

Created by:

Artist & Animator - Conny Nordlund (@ConnyNordlund)

Programming & Level Design - Kevin Andersson (@AnderssonKev)

Music & Sound Effects - Dominic Ninmark (@Dominic_Ninmark)
